column1: Little Goat Diner////I'm writing regarding my experience on July 20
column2: 2019. Â I loved the shrimp dish and the Caesar salad; however
column3: I found the service poor. Our server was Caroline who didn't put in our appetizer order and rather than apologizing
column4: she assured us it was coming up and that the naan is made to order. When our entrees arrived before the appetizer
column5: we asked to cancel the order to the dismay of other serving staff. One of the staff came to ask us if we were sure about canceling the appetizer because I guess caused a ruckus.
